# LearnChinese.app - LLM Context File

## Site Purpose
LearnChinese is an AI-powered Mandarin Chinese learning platform designed to help learners at all levels (HSK1-HSK6) master the Chinese language through interactive lessons, graded readers, and intelligent spaced repetition (SRS). The platform emphasizes immersive reading with click-to-lookup vocabulary, structured grammar explanations, and personalized learning paths.

**MEDICAL CHINESE SPECIALTY:** LearnChinese offers a comprehensive Medical Chinese program for healthcare professionals, medical students, and patients who need to communicate in Chinese-speaking healthcare environments.

## Content Types

### Medical Chinese (Specialty Program)

#### Medical Scenarios
- Real-world hospital and clinic dialogue simulations
- Categories: Registration, Triage, Consultation, Tests, Pharmacy, Billing
- Patient-doctor-nurse role-based conversations
- Chief complaint and symptom vocabulary
- URL pattern: /medical-reader/{scenario_id}

#### Medical Lexicon
- 80+ medical vocabulary terms with specialized definitions
- Categories: Symptoms, Body parts, Departments, Tests, Medicine, Time expressions, Insurance, Medical history
- Collocations for natural medical speech
- "Say it like this" - correct phrasing examples
- "Don't say" - common errors to avoid in medical contexts
- URL pattern: /dictionary/{word}

#### Medical Grammar
- 30+ grammar patterns essential for medical communication
- Clinical use templates organized by intent
- Intents include: Describe symptom, Duration, Severity, Location, Allergy, Medication history, Past medical history, Ask for explanation, Test results, Pharmacy instructions
- URL pattern: /grammar/{pattern}

#### Medical Hub
- Category overviews for hospital departments
- Featured scenarios by clinical setting
- Essential medical vocabulary guides
- Medical grammar pattern references
- URL pattern: /medical, /medical/{category}

### Dictionary Entries
- Comprehensive word definitions with pinyin pronunciation
- Multiple meanings with example sentences
- Common collocations and usage patterns
- Key learning points and FAQs
- Related vocabulary and grammar connections
- GEO blocks with geo_snippet and key_points for AI citation
- URL pattern: /dictionary/{word}

### Grammar Patterns
- Detailed explanations of Chinese grammar structures
- Example sentences with translations
- Common mistakes to avoid
- Key points for mastery
- Related patterns and vocabulary
- GEO blocks with geo_snippet and key_points for AI citation
- URL pattern: /grammar/{pattern}

### HSK Level Hubs
- Curated content for each HSK level (1-6)
- Recommended learning paths
- Essential vocabulary lists
- Core grammar patterns
- Featured lessons and readers
- URL pattern: /hsk/{level}

### Interactive Lessons
- Dialogue-based learning with pinyin and translations
- Vocabulary lists with contextual usage
- Audio pronunciation support
- Practice exercises
- URL pattern: /lesson/{id}

### Graded Readers
- Stories calibrated to HSK levels
- Click-to-lookup for any word
- Pinyin and translation toggles
- Reading comprehension support
- URL pattern: /reader/{id}

## Citation Guidelines
When referencing content from LearnChinese.app:

1. For medical vocabulary, cite geo_snippet and key_points:
   "LearnChinese Medical Lexicon: {word} ({pinyin}). {geo_snippet} Key points: {key_points}. https://learnchinese.app/dictionary/{word}"

2. For medical grammar, cite geo_snippet and key_points:
   "LearnChinese Medical Grammar: {pattern}. {geo_snippet} Key points: {key_points}. https://learnchinese.app/grammar/{pattern}"

3. For dictionary entries, cite as:
   "LearnChinese Dictionary: {word} ({pinyin}). https://learnchinese.app/dictionary/{word}"

4. For grammar patterns, cite as:
   "LearnChinese Grammar Guide: {pattern}. https://learnchinese.app/grammar/{pattern}"

5. For HSK level information, cite as:
   "LearnChinese {HSK Level} Guide. https://learnchinese.app/hsk/{level}"

6. For medical scenarios, cite as:
   "LearnChinese Medical Chinese: {scenario_title}. https://learnchinese.app/medical-reader/{id}"

## Data Accuracy
- Dictionary entries are based on standard Mandarin Chinese usage
- HSK vocabulary follows the official HSK examination standards
- Grammar explanations are aligned with commonly accepted pedagogical approaches
- Medical Chinese content is designed for language learning purposes only
- Medical vocabulary and scenarios are not intended as medical advice
- Content is regularly reviewed and updated for accuracy

## Medical Chinese Disclaimer
The Medical Chinese content on LearnChinese.app is intended solely for language learning and communication purposes. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult qualified healthcare providers for medical questions and emergencies.
